original_title: Roy Chubby Brown's Front Page Boobs
overview: Roy Chubby Brown returns with his bluest show yet, Front Page Boobs, live from Lincoln and brand new for 2012. He’s still rude, he’s still crude and this time he’s turning headlines into punch lines as his rip-roaring brand of banter continues to burst bellies across the country. Chubby doesn’t hold back from sharing his outlandish views on news, women and sex, sailing so close to the mark, even the most seasoned of fans will be left gob-smacked! Front Page Boobs even includes a verse of Chubby’s unforgettable rendition of ‘Alice’, on DVD for the first time ever.  As politically incorrect as ever, “The World’s Most Outrageous Comedian” is far too rude for TV!
title: Roy Chubby Brown's Front Page Boobs
